name: WebChatGPT: ChatGPT with internet access
description: Augment your ChatGPT prompts with relevant web search results through web browsing.

settings.feature__web_access__delete_prompt_confi: Are you sure you want to delete this prompt? Please note that once you delete it, the action cannot be undone.
settings.feature__web_access__variable__web_resul: Insert variable for the web results (optional)
settings.feature__web_access__variable__current_d: Insert variable for the current date (optional)
settings.feature__web_access__variable__query__to: Insert variable for the initial query (required)
settings.feature__web_access__smart_search__toolt: Use AI to generate a refined search query instead of searching your entered question directly.
settings.feature__search_with_ai__title: Display AI responses next to search results
settings.feature__search_with_ai__trigger_mode__a: Display AI response for every search.
settings.feature__search_with_ai__trigger_mode__q: Display AI response whenever your search query ends with a question mark.
settings.feature__search_with_ai__trigger_mode__m: Display AI response only when you click a button manually.
settings.feature__preferred_language__field_prefe: View all interface text in your chosen language.
settings.feature__support__join_discord__card_des: Join our Discord community where you can ask questions, find inspiration, and receive the newest updates and tips on WebChatGPT, prompts, AI, and more.
settings.feature__support__leave_review__card_des: Your support and feedback means the whole world to us. They enable us to consistently improve and upgrade WebChatGPT, making it better and more useful for you.

client.chatgpt__textarea_placeholder: Press / to open the commands menu
client.chatgpt__slash_command__site__desc: Restrict search results to a specific website, e.g. /site:wikipedia.com
client.chatgpt__slash_command__page__desc: Get the content of a specific page, e.g. /page:maxai.me/prompts
